dropbox.title: Drag & drop or click to select a PDF document from your device.
dropbox.subtitle: Your documents won't be uploaded or saved.

meta.issuerVerifiedByInformation: This service provider has subjected the issuer to careful scrutiny. Only authorized individuals are able to request the verification of their organizationâ€™s identity.

technicalProblem.message:
Due to temporary technical problems we are currently unable to verify your document.
Our team has already been notified automatically and is working to fix the issue.
Please try again a bit later.
We apologize for the inconvenience.
technicalProblem.offchainMessage: Due to temporary technical problems we are currently unable to deliver a complete verification result. Please try again a bit later.

notFound.message:
This document could not be found in Certifaction's blockchain records.
Please note that this is not proof that it has been forged. The document may have been altered unintentionally or there could be a technical problem. Try again in a few minutes or contact the issuer indicated in the document.

revokedUnverified.status: This document is authentic but has been revoked and the issuer is not verified
revokedUnverified.message:
This document was originally registered in this exact form by the issuer but since has been revoked using the Certifaction technology.
It may or may not have been replaced by a newer version. Please contact the issuer for further information.
Caution: The identity of the above issuer has been self-declared, which means it has not been verified by Certifaction or our trusted partners. If you are unsure about this document's origin, please contact the alleged issuer.

revoked.status: This document is authentic but has been revoked
revoked.message:
This document was originally registered in this exact form by the issuer but since has been revoked using the Certifaction technology.
It may or may not have been replaced by a newer version. Please contact the issuer for further information.

processing.message:
This document in this exact form is in the process of being registered on the Ethereum blockchain through Certifaction by the above issuer.
Please check back in a few minutes

selfDeclared.status: This is an authentic document from an unverified issuer
selfDeclared.message:
Caution: This document has been registered in this exact form on the Ethereum blockchain using the Certifaction technology.
However, the identity of the above issuer has been self-declared, which means it has not been verified by Certifaction or our trusted partners. If you are unsure about this document's origin, please contact the alleged issuer.

verified.status: This document is authentic and from a verified issuer
verified.message:
This document has been registered in this exact form on the Ethereum blockchain by the above issuer using the Certifaction technology.
The issuer's identity has been verified by Certifaction or our trusted partners.
